A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every single male in this movie acts like someone you should not be around. The only chance of having some heroism\, by a character that is like the Jar Jar of this trilogy\, would be to have Finn sacrifice himself for everyone else. At the last moment he is stopped by the worst character of every SW movie yet\, and then she utters a sentence that is just... soooo snowflaky that it just becomes unbearable! \n\nSeveral things break this universe's rules and many things are downright stupid. The only good thing about it is the visuals. The story sucks and it killed my motivation to watch episode XIX.
